alert.note: Alert for South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued December 05 at 1:58AM MST until December 07 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 2 AM MST EARLY THIS MORNING... ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY EVENING THROUGH THURSDAY EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 65 mph possible. * WHERE...South Laramie Range and South Laramie Range Foothills. * WHEN...From Wednesday evening through Thursday evening. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight or high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills
